website_summaries.verdict: This bistro-style table is perfect for patios or smaller spaces and has a versatile design that's easy to match with existing furniture.
pros: It's compact, but with smaller chairs it manages to accommodate up to four
Tempered glass top has a water-ripple effect, eliminating the hassle of continuous wiping to prevent smudges
Powder-coated steel frame is durable and weather-resistant
cons: Although tempered, the glass top can still break under extreme force

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Table for my Deck!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table for my deck. I wanted a medium sized table for two and this table fits my needs and more, as I anticipate it seating four. Just the right size for intimate conversation and card games. This table shipped quickly and was easy to assemble. All parts and tools required for assembly are included. I just opened the package and was able to assemble this table in 20 minutes. The table is sturdy and attractive, with nice coating and color. I'm happy to have made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Silverclone1

customer_reviews.title: This table is great and a steal at this price
customer_reviews.text: This table is great and a steal at this price! There are plenty of patio tables just like this in the $100-200 range and in fact I would still be very happy with this table and consider it a good value if I had paid $130 instead of $65.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Green

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together, but it was missing washers. The hardware pack only contained 8 washers, there should have been 16. Also one leg is missing the leg cap insert. I will need to find parts before I can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Gman5

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this table to enable us to have dinners outside during the summer and to entertain. It's a perfect size for two couples and is attractive. The only issue was during assembly. I followed the pictorial diagram and was getting extremely frustrated until I discovered you can slide the the slots the legs go into. My bad, I thought they were fixed so there was no way to connect the two middle braces. This may be intuitive to everyone else, however, once I figured that out, it went together quickly and easily. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: scholasticus

customer_reviews.title: great table great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: We just set up our new square glass table. It looks really good and it just fit our little space we have. It was pretty easy to put together. It seams to match the chairs we already had!! I would say it may be alittle small for 4 to eat at but perfect for 2.
customer_reviews.author: lilly

customer_reviews.title: Its not sturdy without washers that I personally do not have or ...
customer_reviews.text: Table missing half od the washers and clear bumpers for the glass. So packing and instructions did not contain what it was supposed to be in the package. So the table cannot be assembled at this point as it should be. Its not sturdy without washers that I personally do not have or they do not fit, this should be provided with the table. and they sent only 8 when instructions manual clearly states package should contain 16.
customer_reviews.author: ACroG

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: It has a damage, however we can live with it. It's a very strong table for outside.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Nice little table for small patio/balcony
customer_reviews.text: Nice little table for small patio/balcony. I do wish there was no umbrella hole, but, it matched our two swivel seats and is made well.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Nice height for our taller chairs and great size if you’re just using it for drinks, etc. Not really a dining table, but we weren’t going to use it for that. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Le

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together albeit it was missing washers
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together albeit it was missing washers. I think the wrong parts pack was included. Should of had 16 washers according to the instructions but only received 8.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This table is the perfect size for our back patio. It arrived on time and in good condition. It was easy to assemble. The color is a lovely dark brown, and the quality of the metal and glass looks good. Very please with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my suggestion is be smart shop around before you make your purchase
customer_reviews.text: paid 90 something dollars at the time of purchase , felt cheated , when i shop around and saw that i could have paid way less, my suggestion is be smart shop around before you make your purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Janica  Senior

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is just right for my deck and I can handle it myself so winter storage won';t be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sister K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this quality table. It went together pretty easily and is the perfect size to seat four on the patio..
customer_reviews.author: FLGardener

customer_reviews.title: Product is as described. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly directions were very small to read. The table however is simple to put together. It seems very sturdy to be so small. It fits the area on my deck beautifully and I have already received compliments. The product was a very nice purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: all parts wee not included and its wobbly.
customer_reviews.text: It's an attractive table but after it was assembled I realized that 2 bumpers were missing. Also, the table legs are uneven.
customer_reviews.author: grannie

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy table. I have a large rectangle umbrella inserted in the center hole. Even in the high AZ winds it holds the umbrella. I was concerned it might topple.
customer_reviews.author: nancy Zarate

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: two people assembled with no difficulty. Very good buy at very reasonable price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya H. Spinelli

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my new Cloud Mountain Patio table!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my new Cloud Mountain Patio table!!! Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: ebby gyrl

customer_reviews.title: Super Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i needed for my deck, and umbrella. Very easy assembly!
customer_reviews.author: VINÉ

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. It's not a 'dinner party' sized table
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small table on a deck to have coffee or a light meal. This is perfect. It's not a 'dinner party' sized table, but does the intended job very well. It's well made, easy to put together, all tools included, and definitely a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Solid table.  Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very solid table. Good for the price. Would recommend. I wanted a small table for 2. This is perfect. It does sit 4 but it may be a little tight on elbow room.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Cloud mountain 32”x32” outdoor dining table
customer_reviews.text: One plastic corner piece of the table that is attached to a leg was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Nealon

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. fits great on my patio. Great size and looks good with my other patio furniture. Easy to put together as well. Shipping was fast too. Sturdy table and is nice for 3 to 4 people to use at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Duan Perrin

customer_reviews.title: Patio table
customer_reviews.text: Table top was a little smaller than I thought it would be, but easy to assemble and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Five
customer_reviews.text: The table's size was better suited for my small closed in patio. I was very pleased with the purchased table.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small deck
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as presented with ease of assembly. Perfect for a small deck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected and fit right in with our chairs
customer_reviews.text: Better then expected and fit right in with our chairs. Also the price was great compared to the three stores we looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Crawford

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as expected AND had to PAY SHIPPING FOR RETURN!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Size and quality of table was good. Also easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT TABLE JUST WISH THE HOLE FOR THE UMBRELLA WAS A LITTLE LARGER
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great durable table.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this table ! I have it on my patio and it fits great. My son doesn't give me a hard time doing his homework anymore because he loves to do it outside on our new table. I have coffee on it in the morning and at nighttime it's chocolate martinis and cards. This table is great because it's not to big and not too small it's the perfect size. It's very durable too. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: vava

customer_reviews.title: It is just perfect for our use in a very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty table that fits well in the corner of our deck. It is just perfect for our use in a very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: SFPilot

customer_reviews.title: This table us cheap quality and when the wind knocked ...
customer_reviews.text: This table us cheap quality and when the wind knocked it over it shattered into pieces all over the pool deck. My kids were pulling bits of glass out of their feet for the whole summer.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

product_meta.title: Cloud Mountain 32" x 32" Outdoor Dining Table Tempered Glass Table Patio Bistro Table Top Umbrella Stand Square Table Deck Outdoor Furniture Garden Table, Dark Chocolate
feature_bullets: 【HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL】: 5mm thickness tempered water ripple glass for table top, durable steel tube for frame. That makes our patio tables against severe weather and ensure longer service life.

【SAFETY & EASY TO CLEAN】: Tempered glass is a type of safety glass compared with normal glass, because of its high strength. The water ripple glass and the powder coated steel feels smooth, which can be quickly wiped.

【STABLE STRUCTURE DESIGN】: Double rear-leg-connector design makes our tempered glass table more secure and steady. The center umbrella hole fits most patio umbrella. The convenient design helps your umbrella cover as much sunlight as possible, and save more space.
【MORE DETAILS IN TABLE】: Our outdoor square table with customized screw caps avoiding rust. This small detail can improve the outdoor table overall waterproof performance.

【PROFESSIONAL CUSTOMER SERVICE】: 1-YEAR WARRANTY is covered for this set. Our bistro glass top table is directly shipped from US in 1 box. All package should be delivered well branded and sealed. If you find any damage caused in transit, please contact us directly to solve your problem without hesitation. Our customer support team will reply to your message in 24 hours about any issue with your orders.
